definitions.definition: The printing process in which ink is applied to the top surface of a raised image area, which is then pressed against paper to transfer the image.
Printing directly from type , in distinction from printing from plates .
A machine used for such printing .

main_definition: ( printing ) The printing process in which ink is applied to the top surface of a raised image area, which is then pressed against paper to transfer the image.
secondary_definitions: ( printing ) Printing directly from type , in distinction from printing from plates .
